1136: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Oh! It's great you came.
啊…你来的正好。
あ……いいところに来たわね。
아…… 좋은 타이밍에 왔네.
Ah...you're just in time.
Ah ...... you've come to the right place.
msg
Do you still remember the box you brought to me before? The weapon it stores is now completed. It may be useful for us to battle the Houkai beasts in this opeartion.
还记得之前你们帮我带回来的箱子么，那里面的武器终于准备完成了，说不定可以在这次与崩坏生物的战斗中发挥效果。
この間、持ち帰ってくれた箱のこと覚えてる？あれに入ってた武器の準備がついにできたの。今回の崩壊生物との戦いで、きっと絶大な効果を発揮してくれるはずだわ。
지난번에 가져다 준 상자 기억하지? 그 안에 있던 무기 준비가 드디어 끝났어. 이번 붕괴 생물과의 싸움에서 분명 엄청난 효과를 발휘할 거야.
Remember the box you brought back for me earlier? The weapons in there are finally ready and may be effective in this battle with the collapsing creatures.
Remember that box you brought back the other day? The weapon in that thing is finally ready. I'm sure it will be immensely effective in this battle against the disintegrating creatures.
msg

Previously we captured the larva during the fight against the bug-form Houkai beast. We were able to learn a lot about the Houkai beasts thanks to it. The pheromone tracking experiment was not successful, but we are able to move a large step forward in investigating the nature of Houkai beasts.
之前我们在与虫形崩坏生物的战斗中捕获的幼虫，那次的经历让我对崩坏生物的认知获得了很多情报。虽然之前的信息素追踪不是那么成功，但是对于了解崩坏生物诞生本质的探索还是有很大的帮助。
こないだの虫形崩壊生物との戦いで幼虫を捕獲したとき、いろいろと情報を手に入れることができてね。フェロモンの追跡はうまくいかなかったけど、崩壊生物の生態を理解する上では大きな助けになったわ。
저번에 벌레 형태 붕괴 생물과 싸울 때 유충을 포획했을 때 여러 정보를 얻을 수 있었어. 페로몬 추적은 잘 안 됐지만, 붕괴 생물의 생태를 이해하는 데 큰 도움이 됐지.

The larvae we captured in the previous battle with insectoid disintegrating creatures, that experience gave me a lot of information about the knowledge of disintegrating creatures. Although the previous pheromone tracking was not that successful, it was still a great help in the quest to understand the nature of the birth of the disintegrating creatures.

I was able to get a lot of information from the larvae I captured the other day in my battle with the insectoid disintegrator. Tracking the pheromones didn't work, but it was a big help in understanding the ecology of the decaying organisms.
msg

The principle of making this weapon is simple. I extracted the Houkai pheromone of the larva and amended slight its sequence. If those pheromones can cause the bugs to change their emotions, I wonder if it will have the same effect on other Houkai beasts.
这次研制的兵器其实原理很简单，我提取了幼虫的崩坏信息素并稍加修改了里面的信息素排序，如果这些信息素可以导致虫子们的情绪发生改变，我想知道它们作用在其他崩坏生物的身上是不是会有同样的效果。
今回開発した兵器は、そのフェロモンに基づいているの。原理は実に簡単。幼虫の崩壊フェロモンを抽出して、配列を変えただけ。この特製フェロモンを使えば、崩壊生物に情緒の変化を与えられるはずだわ。
이번에 만든 무기는 그 페로몬을 기반으로 한 거야. 원리는 정말 간단해. 유충의 붕괴 페로몬을 추출해서 배열만 바꾼 거야. 이 특제 페로몬을 사용하면 붕괴 생물에게 감정 변화를 일으킬 수 있을 거야.

The principle of the weapon developed this time is actually very simple, I extracted the larvae's disintegration pheromones and slightly modified the pheromone sorting inside, if these pheromones can cause the bugs to change their mood, I wonder if they will have the same effect when acting on other disintegrating creatures.

The weapon we have developed is based on those pheromones. The principle is really quite simple. We simply extracted the disintegrating pheromones from the larvae and rearranged them. With this special pheromone, we should be able to induce an emotional change in the decaying organism.
msg
This is a simple mission, you just need to use the bullets that contain Houkai pheromones and fire them to the beasts. Observe the reaction of the beasts shot.
实验的任务很简单，在战斗时将装有崩坏信息素的子弹射入崩坏生物的体内就行了，然后观察中弹崩坏生物的反应就行了。
……で、この実験に付き合ってほしいんだけど。戦闘中、この特製フェロモンを詰めた銃弾を崩壊生物に発射すればオッケーよ。あとは崩壊生物の反応を観察すればいいの。
……그래서 이 실험에 협조해 주길 바라. 전투 중에 이 특제 페로몬을 채운 탄환을 붕괴 생물에게 발사하기만 하면 돼. 그 다음엔 붕괴 생물의 반응을 관찰하면 되는 거야.

The task of the experiment is very simple, in the battle will be equipped with disintegration pheromone bullets into the body of the disintegrated creatures on the line, and then observe the reaction of the shot disintegrated creatures on the line.

I'd like you to go with me on this experiment at ....... During the battle, fire a bullet filled with this special pheromone at the decaying organism and you're good to go. Then you can observe the reaction of the decaying organism.
msg
Don't worry. It's not dangerous at all. I will be monitoring you using binoculars in the defensive line. Trust me.
别担心，不会有什么危险的，我会在防线内用望远镜观察情况的，请相信我吧。
心配しないで、危険なことはないから…………私には。観察の方は私に任せて…………防御線から双眼鏡で見るから。
걱정하지 마, 위험한 일은 없을 테니까…………내게는. 관찰은 내게 맡기고…………방어선에서 쌍안경으로 볼 테니까.
Don't worry, there's no danger. I'll be watching the situation with binoculars from inside the defense line, so trust me.
Don't worry, there's no danger to ............ me. Leave the observation to me and I'll watch with binoculars from the ............ defensive line.

Testing... Connection seems to be fine. There are a few things to pay attention to for the first experiment.
喂喂…看来通讯没有问题，首次试验有几个重要的地方我先说明一下吧。
はい、これがあなたの通信機。本兵器の初実験だから、大事な点を説明するわね……。

Hey hey ... seems to be no problem with communication, the first test there are a few important places I first explain it.
Yes, this is your communicator. This is the first test of this weapon, so I'll explain the important points. ......
msg
First off, the pheromone weapon is still on trial. The accurate dose for an effective result is still unknown. So please make a record when it is not effective before you shoot again.
首先这个信息素武器还处于试验阶段，对于崩坏生物的作用剂量没有准确的定位，所以如果攻击后没有发生反应的话请麻烦记录下来，然后继续攻击。
まず、このフェロモン武器はまだ試験段階にあるってこと。崩壊生物に対する有効量も正確に決まってないわ。だから攻撃しても何の反応もない場合、悪いけどそのまま撃ち続けてほしいの。
우선, 이 페로몬 무기는 아직 시험 단계에 있다는 거. 붕괴 생물에 대한 유효량도 정확히 정해지지 않았어. 그러니까 공격해도 아무 반응이 없는 경우, 미안하지만 그대로 계속 쏴 주길 바라.

First of all, this pheromone weapon is still in the experimental stage, there is no accurate positioning of the dose of action for the disintegrating creatures, so if no reaction occurs after the attack please bother to record it and then continue the attack.

First of all, this pheromone weapon is still in the testing phase. We haven't even determined the exact amount that is effective against decaying organisms. So, if you don't get any response from them, I'm sorry, but please just keep shooting.
msg

Next, the expected effect is to change the target's emotion to a specific one, so that target will lose the ability to fight and will be confused. That means it is not something that can kill them. Don't rely on the weapon that much.
其次，预期的作用效果是让崩坏生物进入某种特定的情绪，来当它们丧失战斗能力混乱它们的行动。所以这不是一种直接杀伤性武器，请注意不要太依赖它的作用。
次に、予期される効果は崩壊生物の情緒を変えて戦意を失わせ、混乱させるというもの。つまり、これは相手を殺傷する武器ではない。だから、この作用を過度に頼りすぎないで。
다음으로, 예상되는 효과는 붕괴 생물의 정서를 변화시켜 전의를 상실시키고 혼란시키는 것. 즉, 이는 상대를 살상하는 무기가 아니다. 그러므로, 이 작용을 지나치게 의존하지 마십시오.

Secondly, the intended effect is to make the collapsing creatures enter a particular mood to confuse their actions when they lose their ability to fight. So this is not a direct killing weapon, please be careful not to rely too much on its effects.

Second, the anticipated effect is to change the emotional state of the decaying organism, disorienting and confusing it into fighting. In other words, this is not a weapon to kill or injure an opponent. So, don't rely too heavily on this effect.
msg
Finally, never use it to multiple beasts at the same time. This might lead to unexpected results...
最后，千万不要在同一时间对复数的崩坏生物使用，可能会造成不可预知的结果……
最後に、くれぐれも複数の崩壊生物へ同時に使用しないこと。予測のつかない結果を招くかもしれないから……。
마지막으로, 여러 붕괴 생물에게 동시에 사용하지 않도록 주의하십시오. 예측할 수 없는 결과를 초래할 수 있기 때문입니다…….
Finally, never use it on a plural number of collapsed creatures at the same time, it may cause unpredictable results ......
Finally, please do not use it on more than one decaying organism at the same time. It may cause unpredictable results. ......
msg
Hmm... That's it. Do you understand?
嗯，大概就是这些了，听明白了么？
うん、だいたいこんなとこかな。分かった？
응, 대충 이런 정도겠지. 알았어?
Well, that's about it, you got it?
Yeah, that's about it. Got it?

Obviously the pheromone emotion tuned to laziness ... It seems that different crash creatures really do have different understanding of pheromones ......
The pheromones were formulated to make you feel lazy, yet ...... really interesting. Apparently, different decaying organisms have different understandings of pheromones. ......

あれ……崩壊生物の攻撃が止まった……もしかして効いたのかしら……？

The movement has weakened. ......! Yay, we made it!
The effects to different Houkai beasts varies among the types, I shall make use of the recorded data and optimize the ratio of the pheromones!
对于不同的崩坏生物造成的效用似乎有着微妙的差别，接下来就是统计效果和类型来优化信息素的配比了！
崩壊生物によって効き目に微妙な差があるみたい。これから効果とタイプの統計データを取って、フェロモンの配分を最適化しないとね。

There seems to be a subtle difference in the utility caused by different avalanche creatures, the next step is the statistical effect and type to optimize the pheromone ration!
There seems to be a subtle difference in effectiveness between decaying organisms. I'm going to have to get statistical data on effectiveness and type to optimize pheromone distribution.
